p: She had always expressed her wish that on her passing she would have her family surrounding her in a nurturing recognizable environment. With the COVID label attached, she was moved to a bare room—an alien environment, with no visitors allowed. She was visited by carers, in full protective gear, three to four times daily—her only contact with the world outside. Towards the end, a single family member at-a-time was allowed visit to say goodbye. Unfortunately, our experiences are not unique and now being felt by many families within our communities.
